title: Web-Based Prototyping Design for Mobile Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening the competency to design web-based learning tools accessible via smartphones in environments without PC ownership

learning_goals: Can design mobile science learning app interface drafts using web-based prototyping tools (Figma/Adobe XD)
Can develop responsive learning content prototypes following smartphone optimization principles
Can improve prototype functionality based on peer feedback and analyze usability test results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
